name: CouchDB nano 最小
description: nano で CouchDB に接続

files.template:
const nano = require('nano')(process.env.COUCH_URL || 'http://admin:password@localhost:5984');
(async () => { const db = nano.db.use('test'); try { await db.insert({ _id:'1', name:'Alice' }); const doc = await db.get('1'); console.log(doc.name); } catch(e){ console.log('Ensure DB exists'); } })();
